casebody.data:
IN RE: Hilliard Charles FAZANDE, III NO. 2018-B-0683 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 9, 2018

ORDER

Considering the Joint Petition for Interim Suspension filed by respondent, Hilliard Charles Fazande, III, and the Office of Disciplinary Counsel,

IT IS ORDERED that Hilliard Charles Fazande, III, Louisiana Bar Roll number 26638, be and he hereby is suspended from the practice of law on an interim basis pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 19, pending further orders of this court. Pursuant to Supreme Court Rule XIX, § 26(E), this order is effective immediately.
